thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Investors Continue to Abandon Risky Bond Funds

author: Asjylyn Loder
title: Investors Continue to Abandon Risky Bond Funds
text:
The exodus from junk-rated debt funds accelerated in the first quarter as rising interest rates cut into investorsâ€™ appetite for taking on greater credit risk.
Investors in the first three months of 2018 yanked $6.5 billion from the five largest exchange-traded funds that invest in bonds issued by less creditworthy companies, according to FactSet. March was the fifth consecutive month of outflows from high-yield ETFs.
Riskier...
